name: Heartbite: Stealth
description:
This is a prototype for a minigame for the game Heartbite: Dating by Daylight! Some things, like the narrative, might not make sense since this was a part of development and testing ideas.

Heartbite will soon see a full release on both Steam and Itch!

Credits: 

Studio: Serious Squirrel Entertainment

Game Design: Casper Karlsson

Art: Karolina Öhman & Lisa Larsson

Music: John Lundell https://soundcloud.com/lyckstolp

Sound: Rasmus Johansson
